meanings.sent1: The eanling frolicked in the meadow with its mother.
meanings.sent2: The farmer took care of the eanling until it grew into a sheep.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous eanling managed to escape the pen and explore the farm.
meanings.sent4: The eanling's innocence was a refreshing sight in the midst of the busy farm life.
meanings.sent5: The fluffy eanling nuzzled against its mother, seeking warmth and comfort.

meanings.definition: The act of giving birth to a lamb
meanings.sent1: The shepherd assisted the ewe during the eanling.
meanings.sent2: The eanling of the ewe was a joyous occasion for the farm.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected eanling caught everyone by surprise, including the other sheep.
meanings.sent4: The eanling of new ideas in the team meeting sparked creativity among the members.
meanings.sent5: The eanling of a new day brought hope and possibilities to the farm.
